radiographic_examinations.findings: Bibasilar atelectasis is mild in the visualized lung bases. No pleural effusion. Sizable hiatal hernia with food content in the sac. Liver is normal without focal lesions. Interval decrease of previous CBD dilatation. A 12-mm partly exophytic left lower pole renal cyst is noted. No free air, fluid or lymphadenopathy in the abdomen. In the pre-sacral area, an intermediate attenuating fluid collection, with rim enhancement, measuring 20 x 82 mm, compatible with an abscess. No bowel obstruction. Expected fat stranding in the recent post-surgical site. Tiny pocket of mixed gas and fluid under the incision site, non-specific. Moderate vascular calcifications in the descending aorta and its major branches. No suspicious lytic or sclerotic lesions.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Interval decrease of previous CBD dilatation.
